preparationInstructions.text: STOVE:  Pour soup into saucepan. Heat, stirring occasionally. MICROWAVE: Microwave ovens vary. Time is approximate. Uneven microwave heating may cause popping, movement of the container and/or splattering. 1. Remove and discard plastic cap. Poke several holes in plastic film with fork to vent. 2. Microwave on HIGH 1 1/2 to 2 min. or until hot. 3. Careful, leave in microwave for 1 min. Plastic film and bowl may be hot. Grasp bowl on sides when removing from microwave. Carefully remove plastic film. Stir before serving.
preparationInstructions.textHTML: STOVE:  Pour soup into saucepan. Heat, stirring occasionally. MICROWAVE: Microwave ovens vary. Time is approximate. Uneven microwave heating may cause popping, movement of the container and/or splattering. 1. Remove and discard plastic cap. Poke several holes in plastic film with fork to vent. 2. Microwave on HIGH 1 1/2 to 2 min. or until hot. 3. Careful, leave in microwave for 1 min. Plastic film and bowl may be hot. Grasp bowl on sides when removing from microwave. Carefully remove plastic film. Stir before serving.

productText.text: Blend of portobello mushrooms with the nutty, dried fruit flavor of Madeira wine
productText.textHTML: Blend of portobello mushrooms with the nutty, dried fruit flavor of Madeira wine

productText.text: Available in easy-to-open, microwave-safe bowls that are perfect for work, school, or on the go

productText.text:
Made With Patience, Not Preservatives.®
Everything good takes time. Our Slow Kettle® Style line has high-quality ingredients and delicious flavor combinations that deliver an experience that you will want to slow down and savor.
productText.textHTML:
Made With Patience, Not Preservatives.®
Everything good takes time. Our Slow Kettle® Style line has high-quality ingredients and delicious flavor combinations that deliver an experience that you will want to slow down and savor.

productText.text: Campbell's® Slow Kettle® Style Portobello Mushroom & Madeira Bisque is crafted with  portobello mushrooms and a touch of the nutty, dried-fruit flavor of Madeira wine.
productText.textHTML: Campbell's® Slow Kettle® Style Portobello Mushroom & Madeira Bisque is crafted with  portobello mushrooms and a touch of the nutty, dried-fruit flavor of Madeira wine.

productText.text: Campbell's® Slow Kettle® Style Portobello Mushroom & Madeira Bisque is crafted with carefully selected portobello mushrooms and a touch of the nutty, dried fruit flavors of Madeira wine. Savor this combination of authentic ingredients, delivering for restaurant-style taste in the comfort of your own home.
productText.textHTML: Campbell's® Slow Kettle® Style Portobello Mushroom & Madeira Bisque is crafted with carefully selected portobello mushrooms and a touch of the nutty, dried fruit flavors of Madeira wine. Savor this combination of authentic ingredients, delivering for restaurant-style taste in the comfort of your own home.

productText.text: Campbell's® Slow Kettle® Style soups are carefully crafted by our chefs. Made With Patience, Not Preservatives.® We simmer the perfect combination of authentic ingredients with indulgent tastes to create a mix of unique flavors that are inspired by the art of cooking. You’ll want to savor every spoonful of these restaurant-quality soups in the comfort of your own home. ​Slow Kettle®​ ​ Style soups are worth slowing down for.
